rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Infected birds can experience complete paralysis, swelling around the eyes and twisting of the head and neck, according to the U.S.D.A.

rationale: Factual description of symptoms; lacks high-potency language.
